Sentencas: This paper reviews recent work on SOFC anode fabrication at the University of Pennsylvania.
Titulo: Recent developments on anodes for direct fuel utilization in SOFC

Sentencas: In this work, anode fabrication is based oil the preparation of a porous YSZ matrix, into which electronic and catalytic components are added by impregnation of the appropriate metal salts.
Titulo: Recent developments on anodes for direct fuel utilization in SOFC

Sentencas: First, the methods used to prepare porous YSZ are described, along with a description of the structures that are obtained.
Titulo: Recent developments on anodes for direct fuel utilization in SOFC

Sentencas: Next, it is demonstrated that cell performance is strongly affected by the methods used to impregnate and pretreat ceria that is added to the porous YSZ.
Titulo: Recent developments on anodes for direct fuel utilization in SOFC

Sentencas: Third, the role of carbonaceous deposits within the anode is discussed.
Titulo: Recent developments on anodes for direct fuel utilization in SOFC

Sentencas: These deposits can lead to improved electronic conductivity that results in improved performance.
Titulo: Recent developments on anodes for direct fuel utilization in SOFC

Sentencas: Finally, the effect of precious-metal dopants, added to ceria to improve the catalytic properties of the anode, is discussed.
Titulo: Recent developments on anodes for direct fuel utilization in SOFC

Sentencas: Pd, Pt, and Rh are shown to give large increases in the performance of the cells, particularly in CH4.
Titulo: Recent developments on anodes for direct fuel utilization in SOFC
